title: FTTH_FIB-Tool Design Package 2 (Q4/24)
description:
Description
General Description
The "FIB Tool" (FTTH Infrastructure Building) has the target to support the provisioning of FTTH infrastructure for large enterprise customers. Its aim is to provide the status of fiber availability for different locations to the user who can then offer fiber to his/her customer for these locations. 
The FIB tool will be integrated with the Integrated offer in PANDA, but also provide an interface definition and API to be integrated to other Offering Tools within Deutsche Telekom Geschäftskunden (such as FLAMINGO ...). 
The FIB Tool shell be used segment independent and therefore is usable by all segments (KMU, M, L, XL)

FIB integrates into the existing application landscape and does not replace it (shell be possible to integrate from many systems, FLAMINGO, customer portal, Salesforce etc.)

Business Scope:
FIB shell be used especially for our L and XL, M, nevertheless the FIB Tool shell be used segment independent and therefore is usable by all segments (KMU, M, L, XL)
In the 1st step FIB is prepared for customers that can be processed via D3 applications.
FIB will be used by SSE, SBU, Services, Accountmanagement
The infrastructure workflow Tool (FIB) shell support:
- FIB supports the overall process for large customers for infrastructure expansion with fiber optics
1: Upload of mass data and create KLS ID
2: request fibe availability status
3: Entry in technik database of interested parties
4: Quality Gate for state "VVMongoning"
5: Anstoßen der HTN Erfassung
6: Order removal, comply with HTN if necessary
7: Order Bau in Standardbauweise oder additional GF-TAs if necessary
8: Order notifications/updates
- FIB is a project management / rollout management tool with a focus on address and location mgmt for larger customers/many locations
- FIB integrates into the existing application landscape and does not replace it (shell be possible to integrate from many systems, SAP CPQ; customer portal, Salesforce etc.)
